import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import Layout from "../layout"; import Button from "../components/button"; import Bin from "../icons/bin"; function Cart() { const cart = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("cart")) || []; function scrapCart(id) {} return (

Bag

{cart && cart.length ? cart.map((item, i) => (

{item.product.name}

{item.product.category} Shoes
Size: {item.size}
Color: {item.color}
{item.product.discount && item.product.discount > 0 ? (

{"$" + ( item.product.price - (item.product.price * item.product.discount) / 100 ).toFixed(2)} {"$" + item.product.price.toFixed(2)}

) : (

{"$" + item.product.price.toFixed(2)}

)}
)) : "There are no items in your bag"}

Summary

Subtotal
{cart.length && "$" + cart .reduce((i, { price, discount }) => i + price - discount, 0) .toFixed(2)}
Tax
{cart.length && "$" + cart.reduce((i, { tax }) => i + tax, 0).toFixed(2)}
Total
{cart.length && "$" + cart .reduce( (i, { price, discount, tax }) => i + price - discount - tax, 0, ) .toFixed(2)}
); } export default Cart;
